Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.logic.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
- Acts as the controller for core gameplay actions. - Receives input events from the UI and delegates all game logic to the Board implementation. Ensures UI never directly modifies game state, maintaining clean separation of responsibilities.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GuiController c)
      Constructs a new GameController, initializing the game board and connecting it to the GUI. Sets up event listeners, binds score and level properties, and sets the initial game speed.
      Parameters:
      c - The GuiController responsible for rendering the game view and handling UI interactions.

  • Method Details

    • onDownEvent

      public DownData onDownEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the event when the active brick attempts to move down. Manages brick merging, row clearing, score updates, level changes, and game over conditions.
      Specified by:
      onDownEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent triggering the down action.
      Returns:
      A DownData object containing information about cleared rows, current view data, and whether the brick was locked in place.

    • onLeftEvent

      public ViewData onLeftEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the event when the active brick attempts to move left.
      Specified by:
      onLeftEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent triggering the left action.
      Returns:
      A ViewData object representing the updated game state for display.

    • onRightEvent

      public ViewData onRightEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the event when the active brick attempts to move right.
      Specified by:
      onRightEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent triggering the right action.
      Returns:
      A ViewData object representing the updated game state for display.

    • onRotateEvent

      public ViewData onRotateEvent(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the event when the active brick attempts to rotate.
      Specified by:
      onRotateEvent in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent triggering the rotate action.
      Returns:
      A ViewData object representing the updated game state for display.

    • onHardDrop

      public DownData onHardDrop(MoveEvent event)
      Handles the hard drop event, instantly moving the current brick down until it collides, then locks it in place. Manages row clearing, score updates, level changes, and game over conditions.
      Specified by:
      onHardDrop in interface InputEventListener
      Parameters:
      event - The MoveEvent triggering the hard drop action.
      Returns:
      A DownData object containing information about cleared rows, current view data, the board matrix, and a flag indicating a hard drop.

    • createNewGame

      public void createNewGame()
      Resets the game state to begin a new game. Initializes the board, resets the level, updates the GUI, and sets the initial game speed.
      Specified by:
      createNewGame in interface InputEventListener

    • onGameExit

      public void onGameExit()
      Handles actions to be performed when the game exits. Currently adds a score of 0, which might be a placeholder or intended for saving state.
      Specified by:
      onGameExit in interface InputEventListener
